fr.lri.swingstates.animations

Class AnimationRotateTo

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lri.swingstates.animations.Animation
      • fr.lri.swingstates.animations.AnimationRotateTo

  • public class AnimationRotateTo
extends Animation
    An animation that rotates a CElement to a given angle in one second by rotating smoothly this CElement every 40 milliseconds.
    Author:
    Caroline Appert

      • setAnimatedElement

        public Animation setAnimatedElement(CElement ce)
        Sets the CElement that must be animated by this animation. If the canvas that must received animation events has not yet been set, it is set to the canvas to which belongs this CElement.
        Overrides:
        setAnimatedElement in class Animation
        Parameters:
